ip: # IP Whitelist - Trusted IPs that should NEVER be blocked
# This file prevents the automated blocking system from blocking trusted IP addresses.
# - description: Purpose or owner of the IP
# - added_by: Person or system that added the whitelist entry
# - Add all RFC1918 private networks if blocking internal traffic is not desired
# - Add NAT/Proxy IPs to avoid blocking legitimate users
# - Review this list quarterly and remove outdated entries
